price: Na tukampa wema duniani, na hakika Akhera atakuwa miongoni mwa watu wema.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: Na tumemjaalia duniani atajike vyema, na hakika Akhera atakuwa miongoni mwa watu wema wanao neemeshwa kwa Pepo za Allah na radhi zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
